title: BRIEF-Homestreet ‍Court Ruled In Favor Of Homestreet With Regard To Lawsuit Brought By Affiliate Of Roaring Blue Lion Capital​
text:
Market News April 2, 2018 / 1:19 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Homestreet ‍Court Ruled In Favor Of Homestreet With Regard To Lawsuit Brought By Affiliate Of Roaring Blue Lion Capital​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - HomeStreet Inc: 
* ‍COURT RULED IN FAVOR OF HOMESTREET WITH REGARD TO LAWSUIT BROUGHT BY AFFILIATE OF ROARING BLUE LION CAPITAL​ 
* ‍COURT AFFIRMED HOMESTREET’S POSITION THAT BLUE LION “FAILED TO COMPLY WITH COMPANY’S ADVANCE NOTICE BYLAW”​ 
* ‍BLUE LION’S DIRECTOR NOMINATIONS & PROPOSALS FOR 2018 ANNUAL MEETING WILL BE “DISREGARDED”​ 
* ‍NO PROXIES IN FAVOR OF BLUE LION’S NOMINEES/ PROPOSALS WILL BE RECOGNIZED 
* ‍NO VOTES CAST IN FAVOR OF BLUE LION’S NOMINEES OR PROPOSALS WILL BE TABULATED AT 2018 ANNUAL MEETING​ Source text for Eikon:   (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
